headline: Fowler scores 23 to lift Sacramento State over Idaho 83-51
author: The Associated Press
sentences:

SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) â€” Bryce Fowler tossed in 23 points and Sacramento State breezed to an 83-51 victory over Idaho on Thursday night.
Cameron Wilbon had 15 points for the Hornets (8-16, 4-13 Big Sky Conference), who snapped a four-game skid at home.
Sacramento State totaled 49 second-half points, a season best for the team.
Mikey Dixon had 13 points to lead the Vandals (8-19, 5-12).
The Hornets evened the season series against the Vandals.
William FitzPatrick added 15 points and seven rebounds.
Idaho defeated Sacramento State 73-72 on Jan. 22.
Zach Chappell had 12 points and seven assists.
